meanings.definition: The act of applying heat and pressure to a material to shape or form it.
meanings.sent1: Hotpressing is important in shaping metals.
meanings.sent2: The hotpressing of clay is a common pottery technique.
meanings.sent3: I tried hotpressing my sandwich to make it extra crispy!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like hotpressing, molding her into a strong individual.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressing of the dough made it perfectly molded.

meanings.definition: A method of manufacturing where heat and pressure are used to bond materials together.
meanings.sent1: In woodworking, hotpressing is used to join pieces of wood.
meanings.sent2: The hotpressing of layers of fabric creates a strong bond.
meanings.sent3: The hotpressing of the buttons on the shirt was done with care.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like hotpressing, bringing them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressing of the metal sheets ensured a secure connection.

meanings.definition: The process of using a hot press machine to create a smooth surface on a material.
meanings.sent1: Hotpressing with the machine made the plastic surface shiny.
meanings.sent2: The hotpressing of the paper gave it a professional finish.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hotpressed my notebook, now it's all smooth!
meanings.sent4: The hotpressing of the fabric made it feel like silk.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressing of the vinyl resulted in a glossy appearance.
